command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2UdiNgsaUofG98U.a273b31256ed --database hfH9ioTEzRzswFjESim83C --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE brain_knowledge_concepts
messages: `source` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'UMLS, SNOMED, ICD-10, etc.',

stdout:
Table	Create Table
brain_knowledge_concepts	CREATE TABLE `brain_knowledge_concepts` (
  `concept_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `concept_name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `semantic_type` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `definition` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `synonyms` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `source` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'UMLS, SNOMED, ICD-10, etc.',
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `concept_type` enum('disease','symptom','treatment','investigation','risk_factor') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'disease',
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `icd10_code` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `snomed_code` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `prevalence` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `severity` enum('mild','moderate','severe','critical') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `evidence_level` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  KEY `idx_concept_name` (`concept_name`(255)),
  KEY `idx_semantic_type` (`semantic_type`),
  KEY `idx_source` (`source`),
  PRIMARY KEY (`concept_id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
